contents.text: Welcome to Skedulo in San Francisco, the powerful mobile scheduling platform built for your field team.
For scheduling and route optimization support, press 1.
If you need help resolving scheduling conflicts or assigning jobs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a scheduling specialist.

navigationGoals: Resolve overlapping assignments in my field team’s schedule
I'm trying to resolve overlapping job assignments for my field team this week.
I need to resolve overlapping service appointments and auto-assign jobs based on technician skill sets.
I need help sorting out conflicts in my work schedule and assigning jobs correctly.
I need help resolving overlapping field assignments for my team next week.

contents.text: If you would like assistance with travel route planning and productivity tracking, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a logistics support representative.

navigationGoals: Optimize travel routes for tomorrow’s field visits
I need to plan efficient travel routes for my crew and monitor their daily performance.
I want to generate optimized travel routes for my field team and enable real-time productivity tracking.
I’d like assistance planning my travel routes and tracking my productivity on each trip.
I want to plan the most efficient travel routes for site visits and set up productivity tracking for my crew.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
For help with account setup and user access, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our account services team.

navigationGoals: Add a new team member to my account and configure their access
I want to set up new user accounts and grant appropriate access levels for my operators.
I need to provision new user accounts and configure role-based access control for my team.
I need help setting up my account and accessing it, including adding users.
I’d like to add a new team member to my account and grant them appropriate access credentials.

contents.text: For billing questions or invoice support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify an unexpected charge on my latest invoice
I have a question about a recent invoice that doesn't match our service agreement.
I have questions about my latest invoice and need to update my payment method.
I have questions about my bill and need help understanding the charges on my invoice.
I have questions about a recent invoice and need assistance understanding the charges on my bill.
